subject: 1st night  with Radio Shack-hack at Fort Mifflin
author: ejspinn
full_text:
Hello everyone I am a member of Peace of Mind Paranormal Society here in Pittsburgh, PA

We just recently investigated Fort Mifflin.  I made a Radio-shak hack with directions from UFOgeek's videos.  This was our first attepmt with it.  How or where would i upload the wav file for you guys to take a listen.

I am having a hard time getting some of our more skeptical members to buy into the ITC-EVP ghost box stuff.  I am convinced with everything i seen and read about Frank and all his work to what i saw on Youtube etc...

please respond
